Message:
Nina and I called that out together,
as we hid in some bushes.

This feels kinda
familiar somehow...
What was it again?

Oh, right!
It’s like the time we played
hide-and-seek at the lake!

Moddey was there too,
and we all had so much fun!

“’Tis useless trying
to hide from me,
you little whelps!”

Ack! She found us already!
Tama sure is good at finding us,
it’s almost scary.

“Now it’s our turns
to be the seekers, right?”

“Heh-heh! You little whelps
believe you can best me?”

Ever since I came to live
at Master’s mansion,
every single day’s
been filled with fun.
And soon, it’ll be my birthday!

I just know it’s gonna be
an even more fun day than today.
I can’t wait! Ehehe!
